Know Yourself: Tell me about a project you're working on.
Give me a detailed explanation about your internship.
Tell me about your setbacks on projects.
Tell me about a time when you faced a difficult challenge.
Tell me about a project you're proud of.
Earn Trust, Have Backbone to Disagree an: Tell me about a situation where you had a conflict with someone on your team. What was it about? What did you do? How did they react? What was the outcome?
Tell me about a time when your teammate didn't agree with you. What did you do?
Received negative feedback from a manager and how you responded.
Ownership: Give an example of when you saw a peer struggling and decided to step in and help. What was the situation and what actions did you take? What was the outcome?
Tell me about a time when you earned your teammate's trust.
Tell me about a time you had to help a team member struggling with a task.
How would you help a new employee who is facing technical difficulties?
Tell me about a time when you couldn't meet your deadline.
Tell me about a time you committed a mistake.
Have you ever failed at something? What did you learn from it?
Time when you helped someone grow in their career and it benefited them.
Time when you helped someone grow but it did not benefit them.
Invent and Simplify, Learn and Be Curiou: Tell me about a time when you invented something.
Tell me about a time when you came up with a novel solution.
Tell me about a time when you learned new technologies.
Tell me about a time when you innovated and exceeded expectations.
Tell me about a time when you thought of an unpopular idea.
Ownership & Customer Obsession: Tell me about a time when you went above and beyond your job responsibilities.
Tell me about a time when you were 75% through a project and realized you had the wrong goal.
Think Big: Tell me about a time when your team members were not supporting something but you pushed for a more optimal solution.
Tell me about a time when you pushed back on a decision from management for better long-term benefits.
Tell me about a time when you failed to meet your commitment.
Bias for Action: Tell me about a time you were working on a project with tight time constraints.
Tell me about a time you faced an obstacle and how you overcame it.
Tell me about a time you had to cut corners to meet a deadline.
Are Right a Lot: Tell me about a time when you had to make an important decision without any data.
Tell me about a time when you had to make a choice among a few options but didn’t have time to explore each one.
Tell me about a time you used judgment to make a decision with limited data.
Tell me about a time you had to make a tough decision without consulting anybody.
Tell me about a time you took a risk.
Tell me about a time you had multiple solutions and had to select the optimal one.
Tell me about a time when you had to make a decision based on limited information and how it impacted the outcome.
Tell me about a time you didn’t know something and how you tackled it.
Others: Tell me about a time when you needed help from someone during a project.
Tell me about a time when you took a decision on your own without the manager's prior approval.
Tell me about a time when you faced a setback initially but still achieved the goal.
Tell me about a time when you felt under pressure and had to pivot at the last minute.
